localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Insert any preferences you have such as streaming services, genres, keywords, actors, release years, age filters, runtime; and Movie of the Night will instantly find the best shows for you to start watching right away instead of browsing catalogs for hours.
nodes.title: Movie of the Night - Instantly find something to watch on your streaming services
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: JustStream can stream media and screencast to a TV, all the while maintaining a compact form with low CPU use. Broadcast your media in any format, any resolution (including Ultra HD), and most importantly, without the need for any cables.
nodes.title: JustStream 2.0 - Screen-mirroring and streaming software for Mac
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Cobrowse any website with your teammates! Vera co-browsing makes it possible for you to co-browse any website with your friend--to work on a Google Doc, to watch a video together-- free to chat as long as you want! More collaborative feature will be added!
nodes.title: Vera Co-Browsing - Co-browse Google Docs, Figma, videos, PDFs or any website
nodes.author: Han Su

nodes.excerpt: Salut is a creator platform for fitness pros. We make it fun and easy for fitness creators to build and monetize a community. Schedule, stream, socialize, and monetize virtual fitness content - all in one app for free.
nodes.title: Salut - The creator platform for fitness
nodes.author: Justin Mitchell

nodes.excerpt: Take a Walk lets you take virtual walks around the world, filtering by country, time of day and weather. Enjoy the sigths of cities all around the world, and relax with the sounds that they have to offer!
nodes.title: Take a Walk - Relax, in your favorite places on earth
nodes.author: Mars H

nodes.excerpt: Accelerate your development & build fully customizable video-based applications with the performance, scale, and reliability of Zoom's industry leading video-first communications platform. â € Get started at no charge with 10,000 session minutes per month.
nodes.title: Video SDK from Zoom - Build fully customizable video-based apps
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Bambuserâ€™s Live Video Shopping technology drives customer engagement and sales for some of the worldâ€™s largest brands and retailers. Bambuser is now the platform of choice for companies seeking deeper connection with customers across digital platforms.
nodes.title: Bambuser - Live video shopping
nodes.author: Jimmy Hagelfors

nodes.excerpt: Pictalio lets you download and share authentic Stories for free ğŸ˜
nodes.title: Pictalio - Unsplash for stories ğŸ™ƒ
nodes.author: Simon BRAMI

nodes.excerpt: YouTube Shorts is a short-form video experience for anyone who wants to create short, catchy videos with nothing but their mobile phone. Weâ€™ve worked alongside music partners to make sure artists and creators have a library of songs to use in their Shorts.
nodes.title: YouTube Shorts - Catchy videos using nothing but mobile phones
nodes.author: Sarah Wright

nodes.excerpt: OpenReel empowers distributed enterprise, media, entertainment, and agency teams to remotely control, direct, script, film, and collaborate on high definition video projects from a mobile device or webcam in over 125 countries
nodes.title: OpenReel - Simple remote video production
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

nodes.excerpt: Ubacast helps creators host, securely stream videos and get paid through: - video channel donations, - video support donations, - video pay per view. Not all creators can earn a living from Ads on YouTube. Think of Ubacast as a Patreon for video creators.
nodes.title: Ubacast - Video streaming and monetization. Patreon for video creators
nodes.author: Sebastien Peterson

nodes.excerpt: Zealous lets any creator: - Create a home page for all their live activity - Build a mailing list of their true fans - Engage in realtime with fans via live rooms - Monetize through tips, tickets, and subscriptions Join our live Q&A! https://community.zealous.space/r/4ckvmy http://bit.ly/zealous-qa
nodes.title: Zealous - VIP live streams for your true fans
nodes.author: Ken Yeung

nodes.excerpt: Hyper is an animoji voice chat app for gamers & anime fans. Meet people and voice chat, without the anxiety of revealing your real face. We give you tools to draw, voice chat, and more. The more time you spend, the more coins you earn for new characters.
nodes.title: Hyper Online - Animoji social network for people into games and anime.
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: With Multistream Studio you can simultaneously broadcast to multiple live video services while using your favourite app (like OBS or Zoom), video camera, hardware encoder or mobile phone. It acts like a middleman copying your stream to multiple destinations.
nodes.title: Multistream Studio - Broadcast to multiple video services from any software
nodes.author: Alex Denk

nodes.excerpt: Prop Hero is an interactive gaming platform that allows fans of live sports to compete in the action by correctly predicting what is going to happen while they watch. Prop Hero can be embedded into broadcast streams or used as a second screen experience.
nodes.title: Prop Hero - Interactive predictor games for live sports
nodes.author: Daniel Greenberg

nodes.excerpt: Professional Streaming Tools. A full suite of streaming tools for your live content!
nodes.title: Streamtools - Professional Streaming Tools

nodes.excerpt: StoryXpress is a video platform for high performing teams with a suite of video tools- webcam & screen recorder, video hosting, video editing & video analytics engine. With custom branding and powerful integrations for sales, marketing customer support tools.
nodes.title: StoryXpress - Video Platform for High Performing Teams
nodes.author: Ankit Mishra

nodes.excerpt: Jel is the video game for work. Jel is a collaboration tool designed for teams who also play games. Speak naturally as avatars, without using your camera. Jel is the always-on video game you can use all day with your team to hang out or get stuff done.
nodes.title: Jel - The video game for work.
nodes.author: Greg Fodor

nodes.excerpt: A complete video translation & hosting workspace that streamlines the transcription, translation, and dubbing workflow. âœ… Auto-transcribe (31 languages) âœ… Auto-translate subtitles (71 languages) âœ… Team collaboration âœ… Global video CDN âœ… Start for FREE!
nodes.title: alugha - All-in-one video translation toolkit & hosting

nodes.title: Replica 3.0 - Mirror your iOS screen on a modern web browser
nodes.author: Tiago Martinho

nodes.excerpt: Goodbye, generic video chat! Virtual Venue lets you embed a branded virtual event space directly into your website. Instead of a hard-to-find Zoom link, create a persistent home where your community can gather.
nodes.title: Virtual Venue by Mixily - Host custom video gatherings right in your website
nodes.author: Andrew Badr

nodes.excerpt: CyberCat VPN is Your Unlimited, Encrypted, Fast & Ad Free VPN for iPhone & iPad. Welcome to a new world of internets with a super fast and secure no log VPN. Bring down the virtual walls and pounce on all the content you can handle.
nodes.title: CyberCat VPN - A privacy focused, Ad blocking, Unlimited VPN for iOS. Meow
nodes.author: James Stanley

nodes.excerpt: Get a video call and scheduler feature into your services in the blink of an eye. Wondercall 2.0 is the more powerful embedded video call system for any website & app. Now you can not only make calls but also schedule them. And the way to check all engagement!
nodes.title: Wondercall 2.0 - Add video call and scheduler into any service in seconds
nodes.author: Howie Young

nodes.excerpt: FreezingCam is an app that lets you freeze your webcam during video calls on purpose! You can also fake a stuttering webcam or even play a video instead of your webcam!
nodes.title: FreezingCam - Freeze your webcam during video calls
nodes.author: Kevin
